nodes.text: The MK-X Hazard Droid was a type of bipedal battle droid produced by the Colicoid species during the era of the Galactic War. A number of MK-X Hazard Droids were deployed alongside similar models during the Colicoids' war games.
MK-X Hazard Droids appear as enemies in the Flashpoint "Colicoid War Game" in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
